name: Homeless Pigeon
description:
Homeless Pigeon is a passive desktop companion!

Have you ever wanted a pigeon on your screen? Well, now you can! Adopt your homeless pigeon now!

You can leave your pigeon alone  and check on it every now and then. Or you can pet the pigeon - With enough care and love maybe it'll decide to befriend you and follow you around.

Any feedback is welcome :) Would love to hear your experience with your pigeon and suggestions for activities you'd like to do and see.

This game is currently in-development. Many more features to come. 

Follow my journey at @itsdaumpark
